item.description: Heroes, you find yourselves hired for a job normally given to criminals. You need to break a cell mate out of their jail. He is the only one who knows where a legendary jewel was buried. The rest of the group has turned him in, but if you help him, he will turn over the jewel and the rest of the gang. Can you trust him or are you walking into a trap? Bring your friends and your swords to this strange adventure. Ages 6 and up. $20/person. First event is free â€“ call for details. Pre-registration required. More information at www.guardup.com or call (781) 270-4800.
item.name: Adventure Night: Springing a Prisoner
